TopicTitle: After a long mission all facility UI are gone and can't enter

Articles.Content: Every time I went for a long mission for over 30 days this bug might happened. The complete UI for the space center are gone and unable to enter facility, only way to fix it was quit game and verify the file in steam. I normally have this bug 2 times every play, anyone know how can i permanently fix it? Thanks

You may want to buy the game from the developers, and also, how can i repeat this, if possible. 

 

hope i gets fixed, 

slav king
What are you saying lol. I got KSP since 2015 on steam
We're going to need logs...
